title: S1 Ep30: S1, The State v. Adnan Syed - Bonus Episode – Split Decision - Part 2
itunes:title: S1, The State v. Adnan Syed - Bonus Episode – Split Decision - Part 2
description:
April 9, 2018 / Rabia, Colin and attorney Erica Suter answer listener questions and discuss what comes next in the Adnan Syed appeal. 

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon, Blue Dot Sessions. This episode was sponsored by The 45th podcast.

The 45th podcast has new episodes every Tuesday morning at 6am EST. Search and find them on Apple Podcasts or wherever you get your podcasts.
